text.text:
-Star Review: A Memorable Stay at The Kolkata Hotel

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Kolkata Hotel, and I must say—it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel genuinely welcome with their warm smiles and attentive service.

The room was spotless, spacious, and elegantly decorated, with a beautiful view of the city skyline. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and all amenities—from high-speed Wi-Fi to the coffee/tea setup—were thoughtfully provided.
What really stood out was the dining experience. The in-house restaurant served a delightful local Bengali cuisine.
The location is another big plus. Centrally located, it's close to major attractions, shopping areas, and public transport, making it easy to explore the city.
Special thanks to the front desk team and housekeeping staff for their exceptional hospitality. They were always ready to help with a smile and went the extra mile to ensure a comfortable stay.

Overall, The Kolkata Hotel offers the perfect mix of luxury, convenience, and heartfelt hospitality. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Kolkata—whether for business or leisure.

text.text:
This is a very bad property!

Police should raid that guest house for unlawful activity.

People who are giving this property are daily/hourly customers for unlawful activity!

Me and my husband had very bad experiences. We booked our hotel for 1 night, check in time was 12:00 PM. We already informed them. But when we got there, they asked “kato ghanta r jonno” means for how many hours?
We were a bit confused! I told we booked through MMT.
They were like “we don’t have any room available”
We said “but we paid for the room it should be available.”
They said within 30 min the room will be available.
In the meantime give me your ID(That was our biggest fault).
We waited, after 30 min they said the AC is not working, you guys can wait for hour or u can get non AC room.
We reported to the MMT.
We asked for refund but they denied!
After a riot we walked out of the hotel.
Outside of that hotel there’s a lot of scooty!
People around the colony watching us very badly.
I don’t think that is a good family hotel to stay.

And also don’t pay in advance.

text.text:
Not worth the price – very disappointing.
The rooms at Hotel Park Prime are extremely old and nowhere close to modern standards. For the prices they charge, one would expect a far better experience. The furniture, fixtures, and overall setup feel outdated and neglected — definitely not what a guest expects from a hotel in this price range.

To make matters worse, the staff behavior is equally unprofessional. The receptionist, Tanoy, was particularly rude and unhelpful. There was no sense of hospitality or basic courtesy.

If Park Prime wants to live up to its name, it seriously needs to upgrade its rooms and retrain its staff. Would not recommend.

editorialSummary.text: Elegant, posh lodging offering free breakfast, 5 restaurants & an extensive spa.

text.text:
The Lalit Great Eastern Hotel in Kolkata offers a mix of heritage charm and luxury. I stayed in the old legacy building, which had a unique atmosphere with its vintage architecture and even an iron pillar inside the room. The room itself was spacious, though the flooring had an issue as it kept getting uncomfortably wet during the stay.

The morning breakfast buffet was a highlight, especially the tea, which deserves a special mention for its excellent taste and freshness. Service overall was polite and attentive.

However, the hotel’s guest policy was disappointing—restricting outside visitors from 8 pm to 8 am felt unnecessary and unreasonable for a luxury property. A cutoff at 11 pm or midnight would be understandable, but an 8 pm restriction is more suited to a hospital than a five-star hotel.

Overall, while the heritage charm, spacious rooms, and great breakfast stand out, the wet flooring issue and impractical guest policy detract from what should otherwise be a seamless luxury experience.

text.text:
It's an exceptional heritage property, with beautiful architecture and tasteful decor inside out.

Felt truly privileged to stay at such a beautiful property which has probably improvised and kept upgrading with the passage of time. Was intrigued by the 180 year old seal kept at the reception, and the vintage piano in the lobby area.

The room was impeccably clean and tidy. The window view was towards a lovely courtyard.

The breakfast spread was varied and quite vast, had  scrumptious food at the start of a very important day ahead.

The staff is extremely polite, well behaved and caring. They also extended our check out time by an hour and half which was very helpful as I was travelling with my senior citizen Father.

The proximity to Howrah station is a plus point, and there are quite nice restaurants in the vicinity in case you want to dine out.

Definitely worth staying once in your lifetime! Totally recommend it 👍🏼

text.text:
The Lalit has been our Kolkata hotel of choice for the past decades because of their amazing hospitality, however, this time we were really surprised at the service downgrade in the Front Office department.  We were given a lower category room than what we booked (luckily the type of room was printed in the registration form).  Only after we asked about this did the front office night manager give the reasoning that because the hotel was fully booked they had to do this.  So we were downgraded with no recourse, but since it was past midnight, we thought to take it up with front office manager in the morning.

Now for the part of our HORRENDOUS experience, the Front Office Manager, this gentleman was not even willing to listen to, or to look at the documents. His position was that as a Guest, we cannot understand what happened.  After showing him the photograph of the reservation form & registration form, he started flailing and shouting in an even higher tone. Luckily, the acting Hotel manager. Mr Sunayan was there to clear this issue with all the grace and hospitality that the Lalit Grant Eastern has always been known for. If it was not for Mr. Sunayan and the amazing staff at the Lalit, I think our trip would have been ruined. If the Hotel would like the name of the front office manager, please do let me know.
As for Mr. Sunayan, no words can express the relief of sanity and level of service he provided. The Executive Sous Chef, Mr Krishan Chaddha, made sure our FNB experience was amazing.

With the history I have shared with the Lalit, it would have been a sad ending if not for the service recovery by Mr Sunayan and his team.  Thank you.
I have deducted one star from Service, for the attitude of your front office manager.

editorialSummary.text: Polished rooms & suites in a luxe hotel with 7 restaurants, plus a pool, a gym & a spa.

text.text: My experience at ITC Royal Bengal was nothing short of exceptional. The moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was awestruck by its majestic decor and welcoming ambiance. The room was spacious, elegant, and offered stunning views of the city. Every detail, from the plush bedding to the luxurious bathroom amenities, reflected comfort and class. The food was a true highlight—especially the dinner at Royal Vega, which served authentic Indian flavors with royal finesse. The staff was courteous, attentive, and always eager to help. I also loved the serene pool area and the well-equipped fitness center. Overall, it was a perfect blend of luxury, relaxation, and impeccable service.

text.text:
Stayed here recently. A very good experience! Grand and opulent property. The decor is some kind of fancy  blend of heritage and modern luxury, with a lot details at every turn.

The staff was warm and welcoming, always ready to assist with a smile. Room was spacious, elegantly furnished, and offered beautiful views of the city. The comfort of the bed and the luxurious bathroom amenities made for a truly relaxing stay.

Dining at ITC Royal Bengal was a culinary delight. The breakfast buffet at Grand Market Pavilion featured a wide array of local and international dishes, all beautifully presented and delicious. The dining staff was attentive and ensured I had everything I needed.

The property’s spa and pool were perfect for unwinding.

Whether traveling for business or leisure, this hotel is a gem in the heart of Kolkata. highly recommended

text.text:
My recent stay at the ITC Royal Bengal was truly majestic. From the moment you arrive, the hotel exudes an aura of glory.
As night falls, the hotel's lights transform it into a breathtaking spectacle, illuminating its majestic architecture. It's a view that truly captivates.
The expansive breakfast spread each morning was a culinary delight, offering an incredible variety of delicious options.
Check-in and check-out were seamless and efficient, and their team was incredibly responsive over email, a testament to their excellent service.
The rooms were wonderfully large and inviting, but the true highlight was the supreme bathroom. It was a stunning and luxurious space, truly the cynosure of the room.
The ITC Royal Bengal offers an unforgettable experience of luxury and comfort, blending traditional charm with modern convenience. Highly recommended for a regal retreat.

text.text: It was an absolutely amazing experience, reminiscent of a third visit. The staff, the ambiance, and all the amenities in the hotel were very pleasant. From the early check-in to the late check-out, the staff's conduct and everything else were truly impeccable. A particularly wonderful event occurred during the breakfast buffet, which was already delightful. The head chef of the hotel, Mr. Ranvijay Singh, personally approached to gather feedback, and upon learning that I hail from the same city as his sister, he offered a token of affection and a gift: a delicious, freshly baked fruit cake, which I thoroughly enjoyed on my flight. I would like to extend my gratitude to him for such a thoughtful gesture towards his guests, and I will certainly be booking with ITC again.

text.text:
1. Discrimination Against Online Bookings: Guests who book online are reportedly treated as second-class customers. The hotel management assigns them the worst rooms available, which fail to meet even basic standards of comfort.

2. Unhygienic Rooms and Bathrooms: The condition of the rooms is appalling, with dirty toilets comparable to public restrooms. There's a complete lack of maintenance, and basic hygiene protocols are ignored, making the stay uncomfortable and unpleasant.

3. Unsanitary Kitchen Practices: The hotel’s kitchen is described as filthy, with stains from gutkha (chewing tobacco) spit observed in the premises. This creates an impression of a highly unprofessional and unhygienic environment, akin to a poorly maintained cow shed.

4. Food Quality Concerns: Guests are strongly advised not to order food from the hotel due to concerns over hygiene and cleanliness. This suggests a disregard for food safety standards.

5. Overall Poor Management: The lack of attention to guest comfort, cleanliness, and food hygiene reflects poor management and indifference to customer satisfaction.

I had a wonderful experience at Hotel White House in Kolkata. The staff were extremely polite, helpful, and made me feel very comfortable throughout my stay. The rooms were clean, well-maintained, and equipped with all the basic amenities I needed. The location is also very convenient, with easy access to nearby transport and markets.

text.text:
*5/5 Stars - Exceptional Stay at Astoria Hotel!*

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Astoria Hotel for two nights, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere.

*Room and Amenities:*
My room was spacious, clean, and tastefully decorated. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the amenities, including the minibar, coffee maker, and luxurious toiletries, were top-notch.

*Service:*
The staff at Astoria hotel were truly exceptional. From the front desk team to the housekeeping staff, everyone was friendly, attentive, and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

*Food and Beverage:*
The menu offered a wide range of options, and the presentation and flavors were impressive.

*Location:*
The hotel's location was perfect for exploring kolkata. It was within walking distance to many popular attractions, and the public transportation options were convenient.

*Overall:*
I would highly recommend Astoria to anyone looking for a luxurious and memorable stay. The combination of excellent service, comfortable accommodations, and convenient location makes it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers.

A good place to stay in college street, kolkata.

Stayed here for two nights in a single non AC room . Rooms are good and toilets are also clean. It may be little difficult to find this hotel so it's best to ask people once one reaches college street as this hotel is located on 4th floor of a building. Geyser is there for hot water bath. For travel/food pictures and information plz follow my insta. Insta id: @shenoypradeep

editorialSummary.text: Sophisticated property offering a restaurant, a 24-hour cafe & a breakfast buffet.

text.text:
We stayed at this hotel for 3 days and had a really good experience overall.

1. Location:The location is excellent, within walking distance to Park Street and the New Market area, which was very convenient.

2. Room:We stayed in an executive room which was neat, clean, and well-maintained. No complaints at all.

3. Service:The service was impressive. The staff were polite, helpful, and always willing to assist with anything we needed.

4. Breakfast :The breakfast buffet was decent with a fair variety of options.

5. Restaurant:The hotel has an attached restaurant (Rupsi Bangla). We found the food to be average – nothing exceptional, but okay for a meal or two.

6. Others:We had an evening flight and needed to check out early, but the hotel staff kindly stored our luggage till the evening. There was also a weighing scale available to check our luggage weight, which was really helpful.
Overall, we had a very pleasant stay and would definitely choose this hotel again if I return to Kolkata.

text.text:
There are a few wear and tear in the bathroom. The shower part floor tiles were broken and missing. The corners are filthy, I would suggest HARPIC RED to get rid of those unpleasant looking stains. The toilet seats are worn out, lost it's polish because of using harsh chemicals like HARPIC, I assume. The bathroom fittings like the shower and taps need to be replaced. The owner can replace them using 1 nights money EASILY.

The staff is very well behaved, 5 star for that. But they might need 1 star training in order to deserve a 5 star rating. Welcome drink was a surprise though.

The rooms are spacious without compromise, safe was there, mini refrigerator, silent AC, the ceiling fan was wobbling and very noisy at low speed Room#405

The hotel's restaurant is very very nice and the chef is simply the best, we did meet him and thanked him enough.

The breakfast was sooo good. Everything from fresh in house watermelon and pineapple and papaya juices, different types of cornflakes, sweets, pastries, cakes and cupcakes, jams, butter, coffee, tea, palm dates, dry fruits, fresh cut fruits, parathas, poor and idlis and poha and what not. The last time I visited Kolkata, I had stayed at the LALIT GREAT EASTERN but this KEMPTON beat it easily believe me, just miniature if compared but a champion. I'll definitely stay here once again.

The location is fantastic, landmark location. The ONLY major issue was the noise from neighboring buildings, the constant loud roar of Air Conditioner outdoor units chewed up our brains no exaggeration believe me.

PLEASE REPLACE THE BATHROOM FITTINGS and replace the floor tiles in the bathroom. before I come again :))))

editorialSummary.text: Polished rooms and suites in an elegant venue offering refined dining, a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
The Oberoi Grand, Kolkata – A Classic Experience

My stay at The Oberoi Grand was truly memorable. The hotel beautifully blends old-world charm with modern luxury. From the grand colonial architecture to the warm and professional service, everything felt top-class.

The rooms are spacious, very clean, and well-maintained. The food at the restaurants was delicious, especially the breakfast buffet with so many fresh options. The staff are polite, always ready to help, and they really make you feel welcome.

The central location is another big plus—perfect for exploring Kolkata. The pool area and greenery inside the property offer a peaceful escape from the busy city.

It’s a bit on the expensive side, but worth it for the comfort, quality, and hospitality you receive.

text.text:
My stay at Aauris Hotel on Park Street was nothing short of exceptional. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Kolkata, the hotel’s prime location offers effortless access to the city’s cultural and culinary delights, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

The rooms  were elegantly appointed, blending contemporary comfort with thoughtful touches that ensured a relaxing retreat after a day of exploration. Impeccably clean and well-maintained, they provided a serene haven amidst the city’s energy.

However, the true highlight was the dining experience. The hotel’s restaurant - Zyqa was outstanding, offering a delectable array of dishes that celebrated both local flavors and global cuisine. Each meal was a delight, crafted with precision and served with finesse. Equally impressive was the in-room dining —prompt, efficient, and consistently delicious.

What truly set Aauris apart was its staff. Tamal, Sanjib, and the entire team exemplified professionalism and warmth, attending to every request with genuine care and efficiency. Their hospitality elevated the experience, making me feel not just welcomed, but truly valued.

For those seeking a refined stay in Kolkata, Aauris Hotel delivers on every front—luxury, convenience, and impeccable service. I would eagerly return and highly recommend it to discerning travelers.

The entrance lobby was not very impressive so I had very little hope but as soon as I reached on floor where my room was it was a completely different story. The rooms and lobby are well maintained. Service is excellent and fast. Food was also good and service was quick. Breakfast had limited options but covered all necessary food options. Lastly location is little inside from main road which I generally like as u have no road noise and easy access.
Only down side was noise at night due to the roof top party. I don't get disturbed due to this but if u r kind of person who want complete silence then avoid this property on weekends. For people who are ok with little noise can go for it. text.text:
-Star Review: A Memorable Stay at The Kolkata Hotel

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Kolkata Hotel, and I must say—it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel genuinely welcome with their warm smiles and attentive service.

The room was spotless, spacious, and elegantly decorated, with a beautiful view of the city skyline. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and all amenities—from high-speed Wi-Fi to the coffee/tea setup—were thoughtfully provided.
What really stood out was the dining experience. The in-house restaurant served a delightful local Bengali cuisine.
The location is another big plus. Centrally located, it's close to major attractions, shopping areas, and public transport, making it easy to explore the city.
Special thanks to the front desk team and housekeeping staff for their exceptional hospitality. They were always ready to help with a smile and went the extra mile to ensure a comfortable stay.

Overall, The Kolkata Hotel offers the perfect mix of luxury, convenience, and heartfelt hospitality. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Kolkata—whether for business or leisure.

Hotel Platinum is a luxury hotel located in the heart of a bustling city. It boasts a contemporary design and offers an exceptional level of comfort and sophistication to its guests.

The hotel has a range of rooms and suites to suit different preferences and needs, all of which are elegantly furnished with modern amenities such as high-speed Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and premium bedding. The rooms are spacious and feature large windows that offer stunning views of the city.

text.text:
Peerless Inn offers a blend of comfort, convenience, and a touch of luxury, making it a favorable choice for travelers seeking a relaxing stay. Located in the heart of the city, the hotel provides easy access to popular attractions, business hubs, and shopping areas, making it ideal for both leisure and business travelers. The ambiance of the hotel is welcoming, with elegant interiors that give a modern yet cozy vibe. The rooms are well-appointed, spacious, and equipped with all the essential amenities like comfortable beds, a mini-bar, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests often appreciate the cleanliness and attention to detail in the room maintenance.

The dining experience at Peerless Inn is another highlight, featuring multiple restaurants that offer a variety of cuisines. The breakfast buffet is particularly popular, with a good selection of local and international dishes that cater to diverse tastes. The quality of food is commendable, and the service at the restaurants is attentive, ensuring that diners have a pleasant experience.

The hotel staff is courteous and eager to assist with any requests, adding to the overall positive experience. The front desk is efficient with check-in and check-out procedures, and the concierge service is knowledgeable and helpful for planning city tours or recommending local attractions.

However, the hotel can get quite busy, especially during peak seasons, which may result in longer waiting times for certain services. Some guests have mentioned that the fitness center could use more modern equipment, and the pool area, while clean, is not as large as one might expect from a hotel of this standard.

Overall, Peerless Inn stands out for its excellent location, comfortable accommodations, and quality service, making it a reliable choice for a memorable stay.

text.text:
We stayed at The Peerless Inn, Kolkata for two nights. The overall experience was pleasant.

The breakfast had a good variety and the food was delicious. However, the staff at the breakfast restaurant were not very polite and lacked a welcoming attitude or smiles, which slightly affected the morning experience.

The room and bathroom were excellent clean, spacious, and comfortable. A special thanks to Ms. Neha at the front desk, who was incredibly helpful right from check-in and arranged our room very quickly.

We are especially grateful to Mr. Somnath, his hospitality truly stood out. “Thank you” doesn’t feel enough to express our appreciation for his kindness and service.

We also had the chance to try the Aaheli restaurant for authentic Bengali cuisine. Every dish was absolutely delicious. The restaurant manager, Mr. Sanjib, was very warm and made us feel truly welcome.

Overall, our stay was wonderful, except for the breakfast restaurant staff’s attitude. We would definitely recommend Peerless Inn for its great location, comfortable rooms, and exceptional hospitality from key members of the team.

text.text:
"Prime Park Kolkata: A Symphony of Elegance and Culinary Delights"

Nestled in the vibrant heart of Kolkata, Prime Park Kolkata stands as a beacon of luxury and sophistication, setting a benchmark for hospitality that is truly a class apart. From the moment you step through its doors, you're enveloped in an atmosphere of elegance that promises an unforgettable stay.

The rooms at Prime Park Kolkata are a testament to thoughtful design and comfort, offering guests a tranquil haven amidst the city's hustle and bustle. Each room is meticulously appointed, ensuring that every stay is as comfortable as it is memorable. The in-room dining experience further elevates your stay, with a menu that caters to diverse palates and preferences, served with impeccable attention to detail.

However, the crown jewel of Prime Park Kolkata's culinary offerings is undoubtedly the breakfast buffet. With a lavish spread that spans global cuisines, each dish is prepared with the freshest ingredients and a passion for gastronomic excellence. It's more than a meal; it's a journey through flavors and aromas that awaken the senses and start the day on a high note.

Overall, a stay at Prime Park Kolkata is not just an experience; it's a journey through luxury, comfort, and culinary delight. The impeccable service, stunning accommodations, and exceptional dining options all come together to create a stay that is, without a doubt, a great experience. For those seeking an oasis of luxury in Kolkata, Prime Park Kolkata is a destination that promises to exceed expectations and leave you with cherished memories.

text.text:
I recently stayed at The LaLiT Great Eastern Kolkata, and it’s clear why this property—known as the “Jewel of the East”—continues to captivate guests. Housed in a grand colonial-era building dating from 1841 and lovingly restored in 2013, the hotel beautifully preserves its historic façade and elegant interiors while offering five-star comfort  .

Situated just steps from Esplanade and the bustling New Market, its location is superb for both leisure and business travelers  . Upon arrival, I was warmly greeted at the reception and whisked away to my generously sized room featuring premium bedding, rain‑shower bathrooms, and a thoughtful pillow menu  . The balance of preserved heritage features—such as high ceilings and colonial details—with modern amenities like free Wi‑Fi, flat‑screen TVs, minibars, and in‑room coffee makers struck the perfect chord  .

The on‑site facilities were equally impressive: a spotless outdoor pool, fitness center, full-service spa offering Ayurvedic and deep‑tissue massages, and a business center with conference rooms—even valet parking and 24‑hour airport shuttle are available  . Dining at their three restaurants and bars was delightful—especially the hearty breakfast buffets with extensive Indian and Western selections, noted by numerous guests  .

Staff service was a standout: attentive, multilingual, and genuinely eager to assist. Many reviewers praised team members like “Santos” and “Rafique” for elevating their stay  . That said, a few guests mentioned minor issues—occasional lapses in housekeeping and some noise from the busy street outside  . If you're a light sleeper, consider requesting a room in the Heritage wing or higher floors.

All things considered, The LaLiT Great Eastern delivers a one‑of‑a‑kind blend of colonial elegance, modern luxury, and top‑notch service—all within the heart of Kolkata. From its lush heritage charm and spacious, comfort‑filled rooms to its diverse dining options and thoughtful guest care, it’s an excellent choice for both first-time visitors and return travelers. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a historic yet refined hotel experience.

text.text:
JW Marriott Kolkata isn’t just a stunning property – its true luxury lies in the people who run it. Every single staff member I encountered was warm, friendly, and genuinely willing to help in every possible way, making the entire experience feel personal and welcoming.

The rooms are spacious, thoughtfully designed, and extremely comfortable. I especially appreciated the subtle tech-savvy touches – like the automatic curtains that open as you enter and the perfectly set air conditioning that ensures a soothing temperature the moment you walk in.

The bathroom was immaculate and impressively large. After long days exploring the vibrant streets of Kolkata, soaking in the tub was the perfect way to unwind and recharge.

Having stayed at several Marriott properties across Australia and the Americas, I can confidently say that this one stands out – especially for its exceptional service. JW Marriott Kolkata truly redefines luxury hospitality.

The bathroom was immaculate and impressively large. After long days exploring the vibrant streets of Kolkata, soaking in the tub was the perfect way to unwind and recharge.

Having stayed at several Marriott properties across Australia and the Americas, I can confidently say that this one stands out – especially for its exceptional service. JW Marriott Kolkata truly redefines luxury hospitality.

text.text:
The ITC Royal Bengal hotel is an exquisite establishment that offers a truly luxurious and memorable experience. From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you are greeted with a sense of opulence and elegance.

The hotel boasts a wide range of rooms and suites, each meticulously designed with modern amenities and tasteful decor. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and equipped with all the necessary conveniences for a pleasant stay. The attention to detail is evident in every aspect of the room, from the plush bedding to the well-appointed bathrooms.

One of the highlights of the ITC Royal Bengal is its exceptional dining options. The hotel features a variety of restaurants serving cuisines from around the world, including Indian, Chinese, and European. The quality of the food is exceptional, with each dish prepared with precision and creativity. Whether you're indulging in traditional Indian delicacies or savoring international flavors, the culinary experience at this hotel is truly outstanding.

The hotel also offers a range of facilities to cater to every guest's needs. The spa and wellness center provides a serene oasis where you can relax and rejuvenate with a variety of treatments and therapies. The fitness center is well-equipped and offers state-of-the-art equipment for those who want to stay active during their stay.

The service at the ITC Royal Bengal is impeccable. The staff is friendly, attentive, and goes above and beyond to ensure that every guest feels welcomed and well taken care of. Whether it's arranging transportation, making reservations, or providing local recommendations, the staff is always ready to assist with a warm smile.

In conclusion, the ITC Royal Bengal hotel is a true gem in the heart of the city. With its luxurious accommodations, exceptional dining options, and top-notch service, it offers an unparalleled experience for discerning travelers. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, a stay at this hotel is sure to leave a lasting impression.

highlightedText.text:
"🏨 Rooms & Views:
Spacious, elegant, and meticulously designed."

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at ITC Royal Bengal in Kolkata, and it was nothing short of spectacular! This hotel truly defines luxury — from its breathtaking architecture to its world-class hospitality.

🏨 Rooms & Views:
Spacious, elegant, and meticulously designed. I was lucky to experience both city view and landscape view, and each was absolutely mesmerizing. Waking up to such beautiful scenery felt magical.

🍽️ Breakfast & Dining:
The breakfast spread here is a dream come true for food lovers — a huge variety including South Indian delicacies, authentic Japanese dishes, and much more. Every bite was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented.

💁‍♀️ Service:
The hospitality is unmatched. Every staff member I met was warm, attentive, and dedicated to making the stay perfect. Service: 10/10.

🏊 Facilities:
From the stunning swimming pool to the grand lobby, everything radiates elegance. The attention to detail in design and cleanliness is outstanding.

💰 Value for Money:
For the luxury offered, the room tariff per night is surprisingly reasonable. This makes it not just a luxurious escape but also a great value.

✅ Final Verdict:
ITC Royal Bengal is hands down the most beautiful hotel I have ever seen. Whether you’re visiting Kolkata for business or leisure, you must experience at least one night here. It’s not just a stay — it’s a memory you’ll cherish forever.

⭐ Overall Rating: 10/10 — Highly Recommended!

Also be ready to pay tips to 8-10 staffs once you are vacating. As said before, staffs were supportive hence worth paying.

text.text:
It was overall a pleasant trip. This is a budget hotel located within 10 mins of walking distance from both Esplande New Market Area and Park Street Area. We did request for early checkin which we were charged ₹500 extra.

Room
----------

Although we had informed before that we will be doing an early checkin, still the room provided to use was average. The AC was working properly but the the blankets were not that much cleaned. We did ask them to change it which they did, but the new one was just a little better than the old one. We were provided just two bottles of 200 ml mineral water per day for our two day stay for 3 guests!

Bathroom
----------------

The bathroom was just too small. Also there was water dripping under the wash basin (there was a leakage in the pipe). We did ask them to repair it but they told us since it is a weekend so there is no one to repair it. Also when we entered they had not provided us towels & toiletries. But thankfully they did provide us just a couple of towels, 2 sachet of shampoo & 2 small soaps.

Room/Staff Service
--------------------------------

The room service was good and staffs were also polite and welcoming.

Breakfast
----------------

We had booked the room with breakfast package, and the breakfast was really good. It was a buffet system with most of things available like breads, boiled eggs, fruits, juice, tea, milk, cornflakes, Puri sabji, sweet dishes, khichri, etc. They even heated the puri on request.

Overall Review
-----------------------

If you looking for a budget hotel (~2000) in this locality, then this is definitely amongh the best options available. For me the best part was breakfast!. The bathroom quality needs to be improved. Also they should consider preparing room beforehand for guests.

Also the manager was kind and considerate in nature.

Overall we had a good stay.

Room: 3/5
Bathroom: 2/5
Breakfast: 4/5
Room/Staff Service: 4/5

Overall Rating: 3.5/5

Known for its impeccable service and elegant ambiance, the hotel features spacious, well-appointed rooms equipped with top-notch amenities. Guests can enjoy a variety of dining options, a fully-equipped fitness center, and convenient access to major attractions and cultural landmarks. *5/5 Stars - Exceptional Stay at Astoria Hotel!*

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Astoria Hotel for two nights, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere.

*Room and Amenities:*
My room was spacious, clean, and tastefully decorated. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the amenities, including the minibar, coffee maker, and luxurious toiletries, were top-notch.

*Service:*
The staff at Astoria hotel were truly exceptional. From the front desk team to the housekeeping staff, everyone was friendly, attentive, and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

*Food and Beverage:*
The menu offered a wide range of options, and the presentation and flavors were impressive.

*Location:*
The hotel's location was perfect for exploring kolkata. It was within walking distance to many popular attractions, and the public transportation options were convenient.

*Overall:*
I would highly recommend Astoria to anyone looking for a luxurious and memorable stay. The combination of excellent service, comfortable accommodations, and convenient location makes it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers.

text.text:
The Oberoi Grand Hotel in Kolkata stands as a beacon of luxury and elegance, embodying the city's rich cultural heritage while providing world-class hospitality. From the moment you step into its grand lobby adorned with chandeliers and marble floors, you're enveloped in a sense of timeless sophistication.

The hotel's impeccable service sets it apart, with staff members dedicated to ensuring every guest's needs are met with warmth and efficiency. Whether it's arranging personalized experiences or anticipating your preferences, the Oberoi Grand excels in hospitality.

The rooms and suites are exquisitely appointed, blending classic decor with modern amenities to create an oasis of comfort and indulgence. Each space is thoughtfully designed, offering panoramic views of the city skyline or the hotel's lush gardens.

Culinary delights await at the Oberoi Grand's restaurants, where master chefs curate exquisite menus featuring local delicacies and international cuisine. Whether you're craving authentic Bengali fare or gourmet specialties, dining here is a gastronomic journey not to be missed.

The hotel's amenities cater to every need, from a rejuvenating spa and fitness center to a refreshing swimming pool and well-equipped business facilities. Whether you're traveling for leisure or business, the Oberoi Grand ensures a seamless and memorable stay.

In summary, the Oberoi Grand Hotel in Kolkata is more than just a place to stay – it's an experience that encapsulates the essence of luxury, hospitality, and cultural richness, leaving guests with cherished memories that last a lifetime.

text.text:
We stayed at this hotel for a week and felt it was an absolute steal! I honestly don’t understand why this place doesn’t have better reviews—it truly deserves them! The check-in and checkout process was smooth, and the room was spotless, stocked with all the required essentials. The staff were incredibly courteous and always ready to help, promptly restocking items upon request.

The hotel features three excellent dining options: Scarlet (a cozy café/ bakery), Cobo (a rooftop Pan-Asian bar), and Zyqa (an Indian restaurant). We especially loved the in-room dining service from Zyqa—it was prompt, the food was consistently delicious, and their attention to detail (even including small items like toothpicks) reflected their commitment to guest satisfaction.

Another huge advantage of this hotel is its great location. It’s a short walk to Park Street, where you’ll find endless eateries, as well as Nature Study, a peaceful and well-maintained park. Most notably, the hotel is close to the US Consulate, making it the perfect choice if that’s your purpose for visiting.

The only challenge we experienced was the Internet, which was a bit slow for attending meetings or other high-data usage activities. However, it worked fine for basic phone usage.

Overall, we loved our stay here and wouldn’t hesitate to visit again! Thanks Team Aauris! :)

text.text:
My stay at Aauris Hotel on Park Street was nothing short of exceptional. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Kolkata, the hotel’s prime location offers effortless access to the city’s cultural and culinary delights, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

The rooms  were elegantly appointed, blending contemporary comfort with thoughtful touches that ensured a relaxing retreat after a day of exploration. Impeccably clean and well-maintained, they provided a serene haven amidst the city’s energy.

However, the true highlight was the dining experience. The hotel’s restaurant - Zyqa was outstanding, offering a delectable array of dishes that celebrated both local flavors and global cuisine. Each meal was a delight, crafted with precision and served with finesse. Equally impressive was the in-room dining —prompt, efficient, and consistently delicious.

What truly set Aauris apart was its staff. Tamal, Sanjib, and the entire team exemplified professionalism and warmth, attending to every request with genuine care and efficiency. Their hospitality elevated the experience, making me feel not just welcomed, but truly valued.

For those seeking a refined stay in Kolkata, Aauris Hotel delivers on every front—luxury, convenience, and impeccable service. I would eagerly return and highly recommend it to discerning travelers.

Best hotel to book if you're here for your US visa biometrics at the OFC. The hotel itself is very pleasant. Huge rooms, pleasant smelling, GREAT FOOD. There's a spa & gym at the 6th floor and there's a restrobar on the rooftop. 2nd floor has the main restaurant. Everything is perfect. This is THE place to book if it's for your OFC biometrics appointment.
